Impressive delivery times, and I really appreciated the call ahead from customer support the day of delivery. It allowed me to notify the marina ahead of time and made receiving the fridge a breeze.  The install went well and we love our new fridge.

Excellent customer service! The staff went above and beyond to arrange shipping to my corner of the world. Even after the sale they were very responsive and addressed all problems along the way almost immediately. Would definitely buy from them again.

Review.Titre: I had picked out incorrect part and…
Review.Contenu: I had picked out incorrect part and customer service was responsive and assisted to change to correct part.
Delivery time is pretty amazing, really appreciate it.
Quick and easy.  They performed very well

Masoud is an amazing representative! Knowledgeable about his products. Takes the time to research if necessary. Answers calls and returns messages quickly. We were so happy to work with him that we recommend him to our fellow cruisers. He is good at his job because he's interested in helping his clients.

Great experience, would order again! Retired contractor living Az, ordered online from buy boat fridges.com,After much research! Shipped 2300+ miles, with many pics, of before shipping. Arrived with barely noticeable tiny ding in frame! Informed Masoud, within the week of drop shipping to front doo, in rural area I had my new face frame delivered as well!! Communication and response times almost immediately. Doing a custom cargo trailer camper, wanted a 12v fridge, done with absorption type never cold, propane System fridges. Running now the fourth day with unseasonably high ambient temperatures on 300ah lifepo4 batteries and still at 13.2v from fresh charge!Charting the compressor status, am impressed with the performance and battery usage, have no reason to believe in warmer az weather it won’t perform well!So don’t hesitate to drop ship a designed for Rv use 2/3rd’s the way across country, i would do it again & recommend any one needing this type fridge for their needs!! And the shipping charges were very competitive, actually below what other online places charged 👍 Thanks Buy Boat fridges.com🤓
The price was very competitive and our sales rep kept in touch until the fridge/freezer got delivered.  Great customer service.  Would use them again and highly recommend them as well.

Review.Titre: I recently purchased a Retrifrgo fridge…
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased a Vitrifrigo fridge from BuyBoatFridges.com and my experience has been nothing short of excellent. The quality of the product is top-notch, exceeding my expectations in every way. It's clear that this company prioritizes quality and customer satisfaction above all else.The customer service was outstanding. The team was responsive, professional, and went above and beyond to ensure my needs were met. They were able to answer all my questions promptly and provided all the necessary information to make my purchase decision easier.What sets BuyBoatFridges.com apart from its competitors is not just the superior quality of their products, but also their pricing and expertise. The prices are very competitive, offering great value for money. Additionally, the website provides expert insight on choosing the best refrigerator for your boat.This level of expertise and guidance is invaluable and sets them apart in the market.In conclusion, I highly recommend BuyBoatFridges.com to anyone in need of a high-quality boat fridge. Their exceptional customer service, superior product quality, competitive prices, and expert advice make them a top choice for boat refrigeration needs. I will definitely be a returning customer.
